title: El Rey Coffee Bar & Luncheonette
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small restaurant with an eclectic lunch and dinner menu. The short menu features vegetables, with around 3 vegan entrees and 2 appetizers options plus 3 vegetarian dinner options. These are clearly listed. The setting is in keeping with the Lower East Side neighborhood.
